1320660.name: Samael Demo
1320660.description:
People say that if you walk alone at night, in the place of a recent murder, there shall appear an ancient creature to trap your soul into his realm.

Would you simply try to escape or would you attempt to unravel this mystery?

This is the story of this game, inspired by the obscure creepypasta called only Samael.

In this demo you will play the prologue, where a man named Jason receives a mysterious call from his brother, leading him into a world of horror.
